topology: UWB Printed Monopole with T-Slotted Ground
training_captions: Thin-laminate UWB PCB antenna featuring a square monopole plate and edge SMA feed; the ground plane is truncated and T-shaped slotted to control current return, giving linear-polarized omnidirectional radiation over multiple bands.

Printed monopole topology with a square radiator and close ground clearance; T-slot ground loading enhances low- and high-end bandwidth symmetry, achieving mid gain and stable omni response from S through Ka when scaled.
